properties.description: They provide: basic hot drinks wifi people available to talk with (and, if requested, to pray with) soup and bread on Wednesday afternoon  They are also a FoodBank voucher issuer. They are also working with a new low-cost counselling service (Pathways & Perspectives) that can provide professional counselling, if needed, for whatever the client can afford. Facilities: There is a toilet, but it is upstairs, so not accessible (though there are public toilets nearby, including disabled ones).
